title: Can't go on live servers??
body: I downloaded the alpha PBE client awhile ago and barely used it. I am not sure if it is related to the issue, but when I open the client I use to go the live server for NA, it now only goes to PBE. How do i get the regular client back...?

replies.body:
The PBE and the Live client are two different apps. I recommend launching League from your regular installation folder, which should be in the following directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

Let me know if this helped.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EZtaW7fF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-27T22:49:43.495+0000)
>
> The PBE and the Live client are two different apps. I recommend launching League from your regular installation folder, which should be in the following directory:
> 
> Let me know if this helped.

Nope. Still, region is "PBE"

Edit: I tried opening the other app file in the directory, and it seemed to have worked. I reopened League straight from my desktop again and it went back to normal. Not sure why this happened, but thank you!
